pages.text: What on earth am I looking at..
Arethuse is a royal ship belonging to a king of a long forgotten era. Featuring 22 upwards facing cannons and 8 sideways facing cannons, no blimp or ship could ever get close enough to take it down.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)$(l)Deterrent/$$(br)Arethuse fires at $(l)4 opponent tiles in a line/$ to scare them off. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)7 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/anti_air)$(l)Upwards Fire/$$(br)$(l)Arethuse's upwards facing cannons $(l)protect the ship and 1 tile surrounding it, destroying any air-based attacks/$ that enter their range.
pages.title: Passive Ability
